document.full_text: nationalistic concerns raised by deutsche borse's offer for nyse euronext are overshadowed by the antitrust risk attached to a rival offer from the nasdaq omx group.
document.title: in rival bids for nyse, weighing the lesser of 2 evils
lines_and_colors: nationalistic concerns raised by deutsche borse's offer for nyse euronext are overshadowed by the antitrust risk attached to a rival offer from the nasdaq omx group.
